title: Voters explain why they support Rick Caruso for L.A. mayor
dc:creator: Nathan Solis, Jonah Valdez
description: Voters from neighborhoods across L.A. weigh in on why they're voting for businessman Rick Caruso in the mayor's race.
content:encoded: Voters from neighborhoods across L.A. weigh in on why they're voting for businessman Rick Caruso in the mayor's race.

media:content.media:description: Rick Caruso fields media questions in February.
